snippet: Honda, which will run its ad in the game’s fourth quarter, is among several automakers and auto-related companies that will advertise on Super Bowl XLVI.
abstract: Stuart Elliott Advertising column; American Honda Motor is among several automakers that will advertise during Super Bowl XLVI, aiming to reach young consumers on what is considered the biggest day for sports, television and marketing; marketers are estimated to be paying an average of $3.5 million for each 30 seconds of commercial time in the game, up from last year's $3 million per spot.
lead_paragraph: Honda, which will run its ad in the game’s fourth quarter, is among several automakers and auto-related companies that will advertise on Super Bowl XLVI.

headline.seo: Honda Returns to Super Bowl With ‘Leap Lists’ Commercial
headline.main: Honda Returns to Super Bowl, Focused on Young Aspirations
headline.print_headline: Honda Returns to Super Bowl, Focused on Young Aspirations
